Description: Short term lease available at Avalon at Chestnut Hill. Walk to the T, Restaurants and shoppings from this Two bedroom, Two baths apartment with modern kitchen and baths, open floor plan, laundry in unit and many more. Enjoy heated outdoor swimming pool, Fitness Center and picnic area. Garage parking is available for $125 per month. Minutes to Boston, all Hospitals and Schools. Available September first with an option to renew.
